title: Apple Watch 2 vs Moto 360 2 Comes With Improved Specs Sports Version Made
text:
Apple Watch 2 vs Moto 360 2: Comes With Improved Specs, Sports Version Made 
Christian Post Sunday 25th October, 2015 
Apple CEO Tim Cook closes the presentation as an Apple Watch is shown in background during an Apple media event in San Francisco, California, September 9, 2015. Smartwatches are all the rave nowadays. Several tech brands have released their own versions including giants Apple and Motorola. The latest ones in their smartwatch product lines are the Apple Watch 2 and the Moto 360 2. But which of the two should people go for?The Apple Watch 2 isn't out yet but several details have already surfaced giving fans a head start with what's to come with it. According to...
